name: The Last Fight
overview: You, the karate ace, meet six qualified opponents to battle out the ultimate championship. Cool clone of the Atari ST classic Karate Kid II, just a score counter is missing and more levels. Supports both PAL and NTSC. Published as Scontro Finale (as well as Ito Joshi) in Italy and featured in Sport Games n.6 as well as a number of other releases.
